body: Update dependencies and constants
Fix scroll bar errors that manifest when margins or padding are added to the recyclerView or its elements.
Fixed an issue with programmatic instantiation and migrated androidX.
Allows the dev to specify if the indicator should display the last element or the first visible element at the end of the list.
Attempt to fix an issue where some users crash because of a divide by 0. See issue 91.

Fixed an issue where re-using a layout with a bar and RecyclerView in a ViewPager would result in the bar incorrectly identifying the first RecyclerView it found, usually not the RV in the same fragment as the bar. The bar will now prefer the view with the correct ID closest to it in the activity layout over more distant views.
Fix crash on Android P.
Updated dependencies and removed java 8 requirement for apps that depend on this library.
Fixed bug where the indicator was always visible even when unpressed.

Fix bug where indicator would show up even if the scrollbar was hidden due to too few elements appearing on-screen.

Fix crash when setting custom width on touch-scrollbar.

- Updated dependencies
- Scrollbar will now disappear when few enough items are present
- Transitioned to Java 8
- Change spellings to American Engish
- Others

- Fixes #52. That is, it makes the setScrollbarHidden(true) call work correctly.
- Updated dependencies.
The TouchScrollBar will no longer pop out at start up.

- Fixes #49
- When text is changed on an indicator, the view is now resized. The operation is somewhat expensive, so a better solution should still be found.

- Fixes #42
- Fixes #43
Custom scroll logic.

- Upped to API 11 and dropped 9olds.
- Added option to override default drag behaviour
- Made compatible with dragRefreshLayouts

- Documented Code
- Altered scrolling maths as seen in Launcher3 from Google.
- Added more custom attributes.

(Beware that presently TouchScrollBar does not obey XML autoHide=false. I will look into more when I can.)
Enables use of the bars in XML in addition to previous options whose implementations remain unchanged.
- Hids bar when all recyclerView content fits on page.

- Several changes from the fork from bytehq
- Removed .idea directory
- Removed pre-existing scrollbars.

- Fixed the appearance of the drag handle on all devices with different resolutions from the Nexus 7.
- Fixed dragging of the drag handle on APIs 8-10
- Fixed chaining of settings.
- Added second bar style to emulate the Google Now Launcher bar.

- Bar hides if the recyclerView fits on the screen without scrolling.
- Hiding is done more efficiently

Credit for most of the changes in this release go to https://github.com/Tolriq

- Fixed indicator first-press issue.
- Added option to change distance of indicator from bar.
- Fixed validation issues for DateAndTimeIndicator.

- Set out a separate colour changing method for resources. (This is the cause of the API elevation)
- Fixed various bugs.
- Fixed appearance on certain older devices by reducing the indicator radius.

- Made the colour changing methods more sensible.
- Added app testing.
- Added ability to hide scrollBar programmatically.

- Fixed flipped indicator bug affecting APIs 11-.
- Fixed no indicator colour bug affecting all APIs.
- Fixed indicator not fading bug affecting APIs 11-.
- Fixed error when submitting hex colours.

- Another major revision. All implementations will need to be redone, though most should be extremely simple to do.
- Added ability to change the bar width.
- Added DateAndTime indicator.
- Added custom indicator.
Updated to support library 23.0.1.
Fixed bug where the scrollBar would not respect the height of any recyclerView which wasn't fullscreen.

Major revision. All previous implementations of the API will need to be redone.
- Implementation of the library simplified significantly. Elements are now added automatically, not through XML.
- Added ability to change indicator text colour to accommodate lighter text backgrounds.
Fixed fatal crash when no indicator was used.
Replaced compatibility limiting code.
No changes
Added alphabetical section indicator.
Prevented some crashes and renamed some variables.
Original release.
